scripts.detox-ios: detox build --configuration ios.sim.debug && detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug
scripts.detox-android: detox build --configuration android.emu.debug && detox test --configuration android.emu.debug
scripts.detox: npm run detox-ios && npm run detox-android

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/WebTest.xcworkspace -scheme WebTest -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone X
